name: Broken Skies (Nathan Powless-Lynes)
description:
The island in the sky has broken apart! Sew it back together with your sticky webs.

Move with WASD, jump with space. Left click on an island to place a web, then left click on something else to bind them together. Right click to cancel a web, or to cut one that has already been placed. Place a bunch of webs and pull the island together again!

Your goal is to make the island one piece again. Groups will change colour the more connected they are. Look for off-colour islands to see what you missed!

This game was originally made for Global Game Jam 2020, following the theme repair.
